SELECT "立式料仓" as equipName,( CASE WHEN devName='1#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='破拱机' THEN '1#破拱机' WHEN devName='1#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='入料管' THEN '1#入料管' WHEN devName='1#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='震动料斗' THEN '1#震动料斗' WHEN devName='1#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '1#其它' WHEN devName='2#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='破拱机' THEN '2#破拱机' WHEN devName='2#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='入料管' THEN '2#入料管' WHEN devName='2#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='震动料斗' THEN '2#震动料斗' WHEN devName='2#石灰立式料仓' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '2#其它' END ) as part,
RESULT as result,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备"
AND ZONE_NAME='石灰制乳' AND (devName='1#石灰立式料仓' OR devName='2#石灰立式料仓')
and TASKSTART_TM="${time}" GROUP BY part ORDER BY part

SELECT "螺旋给料机" as equipName,( CASE WHEN devName='1#螺旋给料机' AND SC_PART='驱动装置' THEN '1#驱动装置' WHEN devName='1#螺旋给料机' AND SC_PART='供料区' THEN '1#供料装置' WHEN devName='1#螺旋给料机' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '1#其它' WHEN devName='2#螺旋给料机' AND SC_PART='驱动装置' THEN '2#驱动装置' WHEN devName='2#螺旋给料机' AND SC_PART='供料区' THEN '2#供料装置' WHEN devName='2#螺旋给料机' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '2#其它' END ) as part,
RESULT as result,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备"
AND ZONE_NAME='石灰制乳' AND (devName='1#螺旋给料机' OR devName='2#螺旋给料机')
and TASKSTART_TM="${time}" GROUP BY part ORDER BY part

SELECT "3米石灰搅拌桶" as equipName,( CASE WHEN devName='1#石灰输送搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='三角皮带' THEN '1#传动三角皮带' WHEN devName='1#石灰输送搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='搅拌器' THEN '1#搅拌器' WHEN devName='1#石灰输送搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '1#其它' WHEN devName='2#石灰输送搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='三角皮带' THEN '2#传动三角皮带' WHEN devName='2#石灰输送搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='搅拌器' THEN '2#搅拌器' WHEN devName='2#石灰输送搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '2#其它' END ) as part,
RESULT as result,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备"
AND ZONE_NAME='石灰输送' AND (devName='1#石灰输送搅拌桶' OR devName='2#石灰输送搅拌桶')
and TASKSTART_TM="${time}" GROUP BY part ORDER BY part

SELECT "4米石灰搅拌桶" as equipName,( CASE WHEN devName='1#石灰制乳搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='减速机' THEN '1#减速机' WHEN devName='1#石灰制乳搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='管道' THEN '1#料管' WHEN devName='1#石灰制乳搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '1#其它' WHEN devName='2#石灰制乳搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='减速机' THEN '2#减速机' WHEN devName='2#石灰制乳搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='管道' THEN '2#料管' WHEN devName='2#石灰制乳搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='其它' THEN '2#其它' END ) as part,
RESULT as result,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备"
AND ZONE_NAME='石灰制乳' AND (devName='1#石灰制乳搅拌桶' OR devName='2#石灰制乳搅拌桶')
and TASKSTART_TM="${time}" GROUP BY part ORDER BY part

SELECT (CASE WHEN devName='1#离心式渣浆泵' THEN '1#石灰渣浆泵' WHEN devName='2#离心式渣浆泵' THEN '2#石灰渣浆泵' WHEN devName='3#离心式渣浆泵' THEN '3#石灰渣浆泵' end )as equipName, (CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='三角皮带是否磨损失效打滑' THEN '传动三角皮带' WHEN SC_CONTENT='皮带轮是否磨损失效' THEN '皮带轮' WHEN SC_CONTENT='轴承箱油位是否正常' OR SC_CONTENT='轴承箱轴承运行有无异响' THEN '轴承箱' WHEN SC_CONTENT='填料处是否有漏浆' THEN '填料部' WHEN SC_CONTENT='泵体是否有漏浆' THEN '泵体' WHEN SC_CONTENT='泵的固定螺栓是否有松动' THEN '泵的紧固螺栓' ELSE SC_PART END ) as part,
RESULT as result,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备"
AND ZONE_NAME='石灰输送'
AND (devName='1#离心式渣浆泵' or devName='2#离心式渣浆泵' or devName='3#离心式渣浆泵' )
and TASKSTART_TM="${time}" GROUP BY equipName,part ORDER BY equipName,part
